name: Garden Gunner
description:
this old farmer guy was just planting his crops BUT THEN AN APOCLYPSE HAPPEND!  AM]so he modified his seeds TO GROW GUNS! but depending on the seed it will grow a gun based of the plant it grows...
 

How to play:
1.Drag the seed to the dirt patch and wait for it to grow
2. When its done growing a random gun will appear and shoot at your mouse depending on what gun it is.
3. Kill the enemy's and get to score 150 to fight the boss.
4. Have Fun!



Levels:
LV1: 0 - 15
LV2: 15 - 50
LV3: 50 - 100
LV4: 100 - 175
Boss: 175
